name: Extreme Motor Stunts 2
description:
Extreme Motor Stunts 2 is a fast and daring driving 3D bike stunt simulator of the highway with dirt bike.
You be on the extreme bike crazy moto stuntman rider in the traffic rush, and in the highway stunt bikers are the ultimate and exciting thrilling fast-paced racing adventure.
Features
- Easy controls of the extreme crazy stunt moto riders.
- Realostic 3D extreme graphics of crazy stunt bikes.
- Realistic extreme bikes crazy stunts ramps.
- Extremely smooth and intelligent controls.
- Multiple Realistic physics based dirt bikes.
